mapper.select: SELECT notice_id as noticeId, notice_title as noticeTitle, notice_content as noticeContent, DATE_FORMAT(notice_rdate, '%Y-%m-%d') as noticeRdate, notice_hits as noticeHits FROM notice ORDER BY noticeId DESC LIMIT #{startRow}, #{pageSize}
INSERT INTO notice(notice_title, notice_content, notice_rdate) VALUES (#{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, NOW())

SELECT notice_id as noticeId, notice_title as noticeTitle, notice_content as noticeContent, notice_rdate as noticeRdate, notice_udate as noticeUdate, notice_hits as noticeHits FROM notice WHERE notice_id = #{noticeId}
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET notice_title = #{noticeTitle}, notice_content = #{noticeContent}, notice_rdate = now() WHERE notice_id = #{noticeId}
